title: When are we going to get Another IP Chroma sale?
body: Last year, Riot announced they are redoing chromas to make them a little bit better and with more options as well as doing sales twice a year for IP for some of the older chromas. Was wondering when the next one would be? They haven't really spoken much since then regarding chromas.

replies.body:
I'm pretty sure the amount of time the chroma has been out is what triggers the sale. Cant remember the time limit set. I do believe there was a news article saying what ones were upcomming for a ip sale but i cbf looking for it.
